overview: In the public swimming pool of a Parisian suburbs, everyone appears equal: Ambroise, an impatient businessman, and Yannis a regular. Both are the same age, wear the same swimsuit, but come from different neighborhoods. At the pool, where measures of class are less visible based on what one wears, a potential friendship between the two develop. As Ambroise tackles his aqua-phobia, the comic fable unravels representing the absurd reality of class struggle.
title: Wet
